title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Charlie and Ella killed as a result of Cindy's actions?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Cindy Cunningham (Stephanie Waring) is so desperate for work to start on her ‘Grande Bizarre’ project, that she managed to charm new builder Woody (Jake Quickenden) into ignoring the health and safety regulations so that building can start straight away. However, this decision could end up having serious consequences in the coming episodes, as disaster strikes during Hollyoaks’ big stunt week — but will Charlie and Ella suffer as a result?

When Cindy introduced Tom (Ellis Hollins) to the builder she’d acquired for the project, the young man wasted little time in voicing his concerns, as he believed Cindy had simply hired Woody based on his looks, as opposed to his skills. However, this was the last thing on his mind when he discovered that she’d bribed the builder into ignoring the health and safety regulations, as she wanted the work on her ‘Grande Bizarre’ to commence immediately.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In the coming episodes, matters are set to get a whole lot worse, as the diggers and cranes arrive in the village. Cindy’s overjoyed at the prospect of her dreams becoming a reality, but the tunnels below are incredibly fragile, and they feel the strain of the arriving machinery almost immediately.

Meanwhile, Charlie and Ella head into these tunnels, and — following an incident up top with the crane — the roof of said tunnels begin to cave in.

The rubble continues to fall on them as the ceiling cracks further — but, as they attempt to escape, the pair realise that they can’t remember which way they came in.

Will Charlie and Ella lose their life?

If so, Cindy will have plenty to answer for.

One to watch: Monday 28th October at 7pm on E4.

description: The youngsters are caught up in the stunt week commotion.
